body_html:
looks like introducing broadcasting in ATen broke one of the JIT tests. cc: @gchanan @killeent @ezyang

Running JIT tests
.........E..............
======================================================================

    torch._C._jit_run_cpp_tests()
RuntimeError: The size of tensor a (32) must match the size of tensor b (128) at non-singleton dimension 2

----------------------------------------------------------------------

FAILED (errors=1)

looks like introducing broadcasting in ATen broke one of the JIT tests. cc: @gchanan @killeent @ezyang
